sentence: Harper, 38, shot back: “What we don’t need to happen is have Josh Mandel talk for the Black community.” At one point, Mandel called Harper a “looney Nancy Pelosi” for “advocating for all this green energy” when Harper pledged to support renewable energy to help mitigate climate change.
author: Liz Skalka
title: A Hard-Right Republican And A Progressive Debated. It Went As Well As You'd Expect.

title: Republican Mayor Argues Ice Fishing Leads To Prostitution

sentence: A rational person would repeat this trick in Ohio and Missouri as well, where chaotic primaries threaten to allow weirdos like Josh Mandel or Eric Greitens to jeopardize what should otherwise be winnable seats.
author: Liz Dye
title: Mitch McConnell And The 'Moderates' Really Think They're Going To Take GOP Back From Trump
